mapper.select: SELECT users.id as user_id, users.name as user_name, users.username as user_username, users.password as user_password, ur.role as user_role_role, tasks.id as task_id, tasks.title as task_title, tasks.description as task_description, tasks.expiration_date as task_expiration_date, tasks.status as task_status FROM tasklist.users users LEFT JOIN tasklist.users_roles ur on users.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN tasklist.users_tasks ut on users.id = ut.user_id LEFT JOIN tasklist.tasks tasks on ut.task_id = tasks.id WHERE users.id = #{id}
